name: Air-LOCKED
description:
Air-LOCKED

A Tale of Two Villainous... Henchaliens

Use UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT to move the selected (RAINBOW) henchalien.
Use SPACE to switch between henchaliens.
Use E to interact with an object on the board (henchalien must be facing object, not in same tile).
Use ENTER/RETURN to abandon the minigame.
Use P or ESC to pause the game.

We're just your average henchaliens, here to help out our boss! Doing anything boss wants us to, big or small!

Wait, what do you mean our boss has been taken in? We're not going to jail! Let's get out of this super secret base before we get caught!

Why is the base still locked down? Why is everything still secured?

WHY CAN'T WE OPEN THIS AIRLOCK?!

We'll need to get this airlock open to escape the intergalactic police... at this rate, will they find us before we get out and find new jobs?

Credits:

Air-LOCKED was brought to you by Team Too Lazy and Friends

Narrative Design Wizards: Peter V. Baikun, Doves In Dreams
Graphics Sorceress: Nokutaan 
Code Warlock: Kyuui
Best Tower Admin: Littlewords

Music "Dance Robot ACTIVATE" by Loyalty Freak Music, used under CC0 1.0 Universal License. Please go check out more music from the album Roller Disco Dance Dance!

Made for Ludum Dare 47
